H0.text: What country has the largest amount of rainforest. Peru

H1.text: What country has the largest amount of rainforest. Indonesia

H2.text: What country has the largest amount of rainforest. Colombia

H3.text: What country has the largest amount of rainforest. Brzil

A4.text: Brazil's forest cover is around 59% of the total land area, equivalent to 496,619,600 hectares (ha) in 2020.

A5.text: Indonesia has 83% of Southeast Asia's old-growth forests.

A6.text: Forests cover 47.7% of Indonesia's land area.
